definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind (As. rakâsu, id.; NH found, lay foundation (rare); Ar. rakasa bind with rika0sun [rope tying camel’s head to forefoot] (Frey); but usu. turn over, reverse (Lane));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִרְכְּסוּ]] (P) Ex 28:28, [[וַיִּרְכְּסוּ]] Ex 39:21, bind [[חשֶׁן]] by ([[מִן]]) its rings to ([[אֶל]]) rings of ephod.
